messages.author: Chief Medical Officer's Desk
messages.body: Suit sensors max and ill suck your dick

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: we appear to have misplaced your nuke this shift sorry about that.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Centcomm, You lil' bitch, Why would you even bring a fucking nuke on the station?

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Starboard Quarter Maintenance.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: due to our new investments Surpise checkup!! we are sending an offical you better keep them comfy and protected or it will look bad every thing they note down will count as a hit to your budget.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: due to the marks transmited by our inspector they have taken the vault and everything in it good day

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: due to new advances in shittery we have invented the firedome anyone wanting to battle please step into the gateway room there will be a grandprize for the winner.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: due to budget cuts we couldn't affoard the plasma sorry about the inconvience

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Toxins Storage.
